titleStmt.title: Vyākhyā of Śaṅkarabhaṭṭācārya on Gadādhara's Sāmānyanirukti

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a commentary by Śaṅkarabhaṭṭācārya on Gadādhara's Sāmānyanirukti. Śaṅkarabhaṭṭa also known as Śaṅkaramiśra. Number 110 is written at the middle of the last folio in pink chalk, same number is written below on the folio in pencil. Some white dots in the folio in the right margin. Sāmānyanirukti is written on the front guard folio. Two letters are illegible as a sticker of shelf mark is glued on the front guard folio.

msItem.title: Vyākhyā of Śaṅkarabhaṭṭācāry on Sāmānyanirukti
msItem.author: Śaṅkarabhaṭṭācārya

filiation.p: Aufrecht Catalogus Vol. 1 p-710 New Catalogus Catalogorum Vol 39 p. 303

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 atha prakṛtapakṣaprakṛtasāmānyakakṛtaliṅgakānumitiniṣṭhakāryatānirupaka (gap of a letter due to wormhole) haniṣṭhapratibandhyatānirupitapratibandhakatāśālī yathārthajñānaviṣayamava(gap of 2-3 letters due to wormholes.) ṣatvamitika[lpo?]
msItem.explicit: (39r 4) ā pakatvamiti svikA?reṇa yannityatāvacchedakamiti cet sa dhikaraṇaniṣṭhāvacchedakatānirupitavṛttitvaniṣṭhāva (39r 5) cchedakamānirupita

support.p: Palm leaf is used as a guard folio. Only one guard folio at the beggining of the manuscript.

extent.measure: 1 guard folio, 1 blank folio at the beggining and 39 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin verso. last 3 folio are not numbered.
supportDesc.condition: Some margins are broken. some white dots are seen on the right margin of the last folio.

additions.desc: Sāmānyanirukti [2 letters illegible due to sticker] is written on the front guard folio.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added where necessory. Question marks are used with square brackets for doubtful words.

TEI.text:
(1v 1 ) atha prakṛtapakṣaprakṛtasāmānyakakṛtaliṅgakānumitiniṣṭhakāryatānirupaka (gap of a letter due to wormhole) haniṣṭhapratibandhyatānirupitapratibandhakatāśālī yathārthajñānaviṣayamava(gap of 2-3 letters due to wormholes.) ṣatvamitika[lpo?]
(36v 3) sya vivakṣitatvāt? bādhajñānapratibandhakatātvanu?? bhāvarupaviśiṣṭaviṣayatvātnunuśritataṃ prati? (36v 4) tvāhuḥ hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu prakṛtapatraṃ samāptaṃ sāmānyaniruktiśaṃkarabhaṭṭārya[midaṃ ?] (37r 1) ukta pūrvapakṣe sayaṃ samādhānaṃ āha pare ….. (39r 4) ā pakatvamiti svikA?reṇa yannityatāvacchedakamiti cet sa dhikaraṇaniṣṭhāvacchedakatānirupitavṛttitvaniṣṭhāva (39r 5) cchedakamānirupita
